prjText: The Password Generator allows a user to define input options to generate a random password string between 8 and 24 characters. The password must be made up of a combination of lowercase and uppercase letters, numbers, or special characters.

Tech Blog prompts first time visitors to signup and allows a registered user to create and delete blog posts and add comments if they are signed in. This multiple page application uses Handlebars.js as it's templating engine to render which view to present to the user.
